Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: james richards
Reviews.Content: I have a month using my samsung galaxy 2 tablet, and I have not had any kind of problem, the tablet is really unlocked, when I received it just install a sim card and voila, I have access to the 3G network from my phone operator in Venezuela the tabet works very smoothly, is fast, is an excellent product!

Reviews.Title: Samsung p3100
Reviews.Author: Farjana Khanam
Reviews.Content: Brand new, very nice. I liked it. Arrived on time. This is international version with Sim. I can use it outside USA.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Osazuwa kingsley
Reviews.Content: I did buy this product and it meet all my requirement for both email, phone, play station and enough stuffs for the kids, because it contains enough, i am buying another again soon. Is good stuffs to have.

Reviews.Title: great little toy
Reviews.Author: Son Dinh
Reviews.Content: got this for my nephew, he absolutely loved it, in hindsight, I should have bought one with more memory...  I haven't gotten to use it to much so I can't comment on specifics.

Reviews.Title: rating
Reviews.Author: Michael Hawkins
Reviews.Content: I loved it and the only bad thing I don't like is I never like Samsung product but its better than I thought it would be

Reviews.Title: I did not like how it came Tablet
Reviews.Author: Maria Eugenia Guevara
Reviews.Content: Tablet came with the order requirements but did not come in the box, did not bring the USB cable, I get the manual either

Reviews.Title: Samsung products are all firstclasss this one does it all.
Reviews.Author: gordie
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet small enough to carry around yet large enough to be able to read easily. This is the perfect size.When I inserted the Simm card the phone worked perfectly.A big bonus is the IR which lets me use it as a remote for my cable TV. I've had zero Problems with the device and battery life is excellent. I would recommend this tablet/cellphone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent alternative!
Reviews.Author: Luvicma Espina Yilaly
Reviews.Content: Seeing the prices for iPads and other products in tablet market, this equipment is a very good relation between price and quality. Very friendly operation and good apps, is an en excellent choice with cellular service!

Reviews.Title: battery
Reviews.Author: norma
Reviews.Content: The battery died to fast, plus it get too hot...  but other than that is ok i hope all is not like that thou

Reviews.Title: Personal Review for Tab II, 7.0
Reviews.Author: John C. Gibbons "John C. Gibbons"
Reviews.Content: I rated it 5 stars because it met all my expectations regarding its size, lightness and contained all features I required.
